me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api

Interface ChargeableBlock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Chargeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIOMachine, AbstractProcessingMachine, BaseSTBMachine, BasicSolarCell, BatteryBox, BigStorageUnit, DenseSolar, FiftyKBatteryBox, Generator, HeatEngine, HyperStorageUnit, Masher, Pump, Sawmill, Smelter, TenKBatteryBox

    public interface ChargeableBlock
extends Chargeable
    Represents a block that my be connected to an energy network.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptsEnergy(BlockFace face)
      Check if this block accepts energy from an energy net on the given face.
      void attachToEnergyNet(EnergyNet energyNet, BlockFace face)
      Attach this machine to the given energy net, on the given face.
      void detachFromEnergyNet(EnergyNet energyNet)
      Detach this machine from the given energy net.
      EnergyNet[] getAttachedEnergyNets()
      Get an array of all energy nets to which this machine is attached.
      int getChargeMeterSlot()
      Get the slot in this block's GUI where the charge meter should be displayed.
      List<BlockFace> getFacesForNet(EnergyNet energyNet)
      Get the faces on which the given energy net is connected.
      Location getLocation()
      Get this block's location.
      boolean suppliesEnergy(BlockFace face)
      Check if this block can supply energy to an energy net on the given face.

      • Methods inherited from interface me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api.Chargeable

        getCharge, getChargeRate, getMaxCharge, setCharge

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation()
        Get this block's location.
        Returns:
        the block's location

      • acceptsEnergy

        boolean acceptsEnergy(BlockFace face)
        Check if this block accepts energy from an energy net on the given face.
        Parameters:
        face - the block face to check
        Returns:
        true if energy is accepted, false otherwise.

      • suppliesEnergy

        boolean suppliesEnergy(BlockFace face)
        Check if this block can supply energy to an energy net on the given face.
        Parameters:
        face - the block face to check
        Returns:
        true if energy can be supplied, false otherwise.

      • attachToEnergyNet

        void attachToEnergyNet(EnergyNet energyNet,
                     BlockFace face)
        Attach this machine to the given energy net, on the given face.
        Parameters:
        energyNet - the energy net to attach to
        face - the face of the machine block to attach to

      • detachFromEnergyNet

        void detachFromEnergyNet(EnergyNet energyNet)
        Detach this machine from the given energy net.
        Parameters:
        energyNet - the net to detach from

      • getFacesForNet

        List<BlockFace> getFacesForNet(EnergyNet energyNet)
        Get the faces on which the given energy net is connected.
        Parameters:
        energyNet - the net to look for
        Returns:
        a list of block faces where this net is connected

      • getAttachedEnergyNets

        EnergyNet[] getAttachedEnergyNets()
        Get an array of all energy nets to which this machine is attached. Note that a machine can be attached to the same energy net on more than one face.
        Returns:
        an array of the attached energy nets.

      • getChargeMeterSlot

        int getChargeMeterSlot()
        Get the slot in this block's GUI where the charge meter should be displayed.
        Returns:
        the slot number
